Package it.polimi.ingsw.controller

Class GameManager

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.controller.GameManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
ControllableByClientMessage, Observer<MessageToServer>
public class GameManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements Observer<MessageToServer>, ControllableByClientMessage
Game manager is the controller's most important class. It manages the message incoming from every RemoteView, and update the model based on these message.

    int getPlayerNum()  
    void handleBuildMessage​(BuildMessage message)
    This method is used to build on the board It responds with error if: It's not the right state of the game It's not the turn of the player The player has selected an illegal build
    void handleCloseConnectionMessage​(CloseConnectionMessage message)
    Handle a CloseConnection message.
    void handleEndTurnMessage​(EndTurnMessage message)
    Method used to end the turn of the current player It start the turn of the next player and it change the state of th game
    void handleGodLikeChooseFirstPlayerMessage​(GodLikeChooseFirstPlayerMessage message)
    This method communicates with model and set the first player of the game It responds with an error message if the operation is not possible
    void handleGodLikeChoseMessage​(GodLikeChoseMessage message)
    This method communicates with model and set the cards chosen by player god like.

    This method set in lobby the players number of this match.
    void handleMoveMessage​(MoveMessage message)
    This method is used to move a worker on the board It responds with error if: It's not the right state of the game It's not the turn of the player The player has selected a wrong worker cell The player has selected an illegal move
    void handleNicknameMessage​(NicknameMessage message)
    Add a player in the lobby.
    void handlePutWorkerMessage​(PutWorkerMessage message)
    This method communicates with model and put the two workers of the current player on the board It responds with an error message if: It is not the turn of the player Player selects occupied cells Player already has workers on the board
    void handleSelectCardMessage​(PlayerSelectGodMessage message)
    This method communicates with model and set the card of the current player It responds with an error message if the operation is not possible
    void handleUsePowerMessage​(UsePowerMessage message)
    Method used to use a god power It responds with error if: It is the wrong game state It is not the turn of the player Player selects an invalid power use Player did not select a valid position of the worker

    • addRemoteView

      public void addRemoteView​(PlayerIndex index, RemoteView remoteView) throws java.lang.NullPointerException, AlreadyPresentRemoteViewOfPlayerException
      Add a RemoteView associated with PlayerIndex of client
      Parameters:
      index - PlayerIndex of Client
      remoteView - Associated RemoteView
      Throws:
      java.lang.NullPointerException - if remoteView is null
      AlreadyPresentRemoteViewOfPlayerException - if there already is a RemoteView associated with index.

    • deleteRemoteView

      public void deleteRemoteView​(PlayerIndex index)
      Remove a RemoteView which is disconnected, and destroy relation between this RemoteView and gameModel
      Parameters:
      index - PlayerIndex of RemoteView which is being deleted
